brand_info.name: Dove
brand_info.positioning: Personal care brand committed to gentle care and inclusive beauty, focused on real people, real skin, and products designed for everyday nourishment and comfort.
brand_info.vision: A world where beauty is a source of confidence, not anxiety.
brand_info.mission: To help people feel confident in their own skin by offering gentle, effective personal care products and challenging narrow beauty standards.
brand_info.origin_story: Introduced in 1957 in the United States with the Dove Beauty Bar, Dove was created to offer a milder alternative to soap and later evolved into a global brand advocating real beauty and self-esteem.

brand_values.brand_promise: Gentle, nourishing care that supports healthy skin while celebrating real beauty in all its forms.
differentiators: Strong association with skin care and moisturization
Long-standing commitment to inclusive beauty representation
Purpose-driven brand platform linked to self-esteem and confidence
non_negotiables: Respect for real bodies and skin

psychographics.lifestyle: People seeking reliable, gentle personal care and positive self-image messaging
psychographics.behavior: Regular everyday-use purchase, strong brand trust, preference for gentle and familiar products

tone_of_voice.communication_style: Warm, empathetic, and reassuring with a focus on self-acceptance and everyday care

logo.primary_logo: Dove wordmark with iconic dove symbol
logo.usage_rules: Maintain clarity and integrity; never distort; ensure gentle contrast
logo.lockup_behavior: Centered or gently placed; calm and respectful presence
logo.safe_area: Minimum padding equals the height of the Dove wordmark

color_system.color_usage_rules: Soft, clean palette conveying care, trust, and gentleness

style.pose_guidelines: Relaxed, everyday poses; natural body language

technical.lighting: Soft natural light or diffused studio light
technical.color_grading: Natural, warm-neutral tones preserving skin authenticity

model_casting.diversity: Very high; broad representation of body types, ages, ethnicities

product_presentation.hero_visibility: Product visible but secondary to human presence

digital.tone_adjustment: More educational on owned channels; emotionally resonant on social

platform_behavior.Instagram: Real people stories, skin positivity, inclusive visuals
platform_behavior.Website: Product education, ingredient transparency, brand purpose
platform_behavior.Newsletter: Care tips, confidence stories, product updates

print.cover_rules: Human-centered imagery with restrained copy and clear Dove logo
